milestones.text: 1,000 students from 25 countries participate
One Laptop Per Child launches as a social enterprise

Ahmad creates platform to bring business minded young people to the forefront of solving social issues through business startups

years.title: Bill Clinton Partners with the Hult Prize

milestones.text: Hult Prize and Matt Damon anchor Water.org's first innovation fund of US$2M
Hult International Business School becomes official sponsor
Water Challenge is launched asks students to provide clean water to 10 million people
Swedish Billionairre backs the program, Hult Prize is born
Bill Clinton Parnters with the Hult Prize
Hult Prize announces US$1M Prize for social entrepreneurship
First Mexican team participates in Hult Prize opening the pathway for entry into Latin America
Hult Prize funds m.Paani, today's largest loyalt and rewards program focused on India's BOP
Over 5,000 Applicants Compete
Bill Clinton delivers keynote speech at Hult Prize final and awards US$1M check
Energy Challenge asks students to eliminate the use of the kerosene lamp by 2020.

years.title: Hult Prize Named one of the top 5 ideas changing the world on cover of TIME

milestones.text: 20,000 applicants compete
Muhammad Yunus partners with Hult Prize, judges global final
Bill Clinton moves Hult Prize as opening of Clinton Global Initiative Annual Meeting
Sunny Money wins Hult Prize challenge. Today, Sunny Money is one of Africa's largest solar light suppliers
Global Food Crisis Challenge asks students to provide food security for 10 million people in urban slums
Hult Prize begins exploring the creation of a social entrepreneurship accelerator
Hult Prize Named one of the top 5 ideas changing the world on cover of TIME
Over 25,000 applicants compete
3 of 6 finalist receive funding from Hult Prize network
Hult Prize Opens dedicated social entrepreneurship accelerator space in Cambridge, MA
Aspire Food Group wins 1M Hult Prize, UN Calls "a company which can end food poverty"
Hult Prize CEO selected to World Economic Forum's Expert Entrepreneurs Network
Over 300 Universities Participate
Global Healthcare Challenge asks students to solve non-communicable disease for 10 million people in urban slums
Harvard Business Review profiles Hult Prize on "How to Create a Crowd Competition"
Hult Prize@ - a new breakthrough on-campus program is launched
Hult Prize Foundation named as one of the most innovative companies in Boston Globe's annual "Game-Changers" issue.
Arabian Business lists Hult Prize's Ahmad Ashkar as one of region's top CEOs
Nano Health wins Hult Prize
On-campus participation skyrockets to 100 universities
Over 50,000 Applicants Compete
Hult Prize opens offices in Sao Paulo Brazil
Hult Prize establishes Dubai offices
Google becomes partner of Hult Prize Accelerator
Early Childhood Education Challenge asks students to bridge the education gap of 10 million children in urban slums by 2020
First campus and national director Hult Prize Retreat hosted at Ashridge Castle, UK
University participation exceeds 1,000 campuses
2013 winner, Aspire Food Group raises additional round of venture financing
1,500 social business ideas generated
2,400,000 Man hours spent on 2015 challenge
2,500 Mexican University students participate in Hult Prize
National Program launches in Palestine, Gaza, Colombia,
Hult Prize opens in People's Square, Shanghai, China
Crowded Urban Spaces challenge asks students to double the income of 10 million people living in urban slums

Former Prime Minister of Australia, Julia Gillard and Chairman of Aramex, Fadi Ghandour judge global final
USA Today features Hult Prize CEO on front page of the business section
Uber becomes national sponsor in Australia
Impact wins the 2015 Hult Prize launches playcares.com

years.title: 14 Hult Prize Entrepreneurs named to Forbes 30 under 30 list

milestones.text: Aspire Food Group becomes largest insect protein company in the world
2015 winner, IMPCT selected to be the official partner of South Africa's early childhood learning program
Hult Prize CEO, Ahmad Ashkar becomes Esquire Magazine Entrepreneur of the Year
14 Hult Prize Entrepreneurs named to Forbes 30 under 30 list
Refugee challenge asks students to build scalable social enterprises to restore rights and dignity of 10 million refugees by 2022

Inc. Magazine and Vanity Fair run cover stories on Hult Prize
Hult Prize National Programs expand to Vietnam, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Egypt
Hult Prize becomes official start to UN Week, moves global finals into UNGA
